dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4089 IH: Safer Response Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. D'Esposito (for himself and Mr. Harder of California) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize grants for first responder training.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Safer Response Act of 2023.

Section 546(h) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 290eeâ€“1(h)) is amending by striking $36,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2019 through 2023 and inserting $56,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2024 through 2028.
